<onlyinclude>
'''13w19a''' is the seventh [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.6.1]], released on May 10, 2013<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/20130520122050/http://www.mojang.com/2013/05/minecraft-snapshot-13w19a/</ref>.

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
{{Animate|White Terracotta JE1 BE1.png;Light Gray Terracotta JE1 BE1.png;Gray Terracotta JE1 BE1.png;Black Terracotta JE1 BE1.png;Brown Terracotta JE1 BE1.png;Red Terracotta JE1 BE1.png;Orange Terracotta JE1 BE1.png;Yellow Terracotta JE1 BE1.png;Lime Terracotta JE1 BE1.png;Green Terracotta JE1 BE1.png;Cyan Terracotta JE1 BE1.png;Light Blue Terracotta JE1 BE1.png;Blue Terracotta JE1 BE1.png;Purple Terracotta JE1 BE1.png;Magenta Terracotta JE1 BE1.png;Pink Terracotta JE1 BE1.png|32px}} '''[[Stained Clay]]'''
* Added to coordinate with the array of wool colors.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
[[File:Block of Coal JE2 BE1.png|32px]] '''[[Block of Coal]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Block of Coal JE1.png|32px]].

[[File:Impulse Command Block JE1.png|32px]] '''[[Command Block]]s'''
* Are no longer mineable in [[Survival]].

[[File:Block of Lapis Lazuli JE2 BE2.png|32px]] '''[[Block of Lapis Lazuli]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Block of Lapis Lazuli JE1 BE1.png|32px]].

=== Items ===
[[File:Charcoal JE3 BE3.png|32px]] '''[[Charcoal]]'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Coal JE3 BE2.png|32px]].

[[File:Iron Horse Armor (item) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] '''[[Horse Armor]]'''
* Can be stacked to 32 instead of 64.

=== Mobs ===
'''General '''
* [[Mob]]s spawn in groups again.

{{Animate|Donkey JE1.png;Mule JE1.png|43px}} '''[[Donkey]]s and [[Mule]]s'''
* Can have their inventories accessed if they have a chest on.
** Right-click while sneaking to open it.
* The name of the donkey or mule shows in their inventory GUI similarly to other renamed containers.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=13w19a|prefix=Snapshot
|;old
|671|Minecarts with furnace consume coal in creative mode.
|3960|After the last use of a bow you get a glitch bow that when dropped and picked up again duplicates.
|;dev
|15061|Coal blocks do not burn away.
|;previous
|15148|Blurred menu background textures.
}}</onlyinclude>
